The tweet was posted on the Twitter acco: GOPChairwoman, from Republican National Committee Chairwoman Ronna McDaniel, three days after the Associated Press projected Joe Biden's victory in the presidential election.
The tweet suggested that the Biden: Harris administration would begin in January and mentioned Vice President-elect Kamala Harris as the deciding vote in the U.S. Senate.
The tweet aimed to support Republican U: S. Sens. Kelly Loeffler and David Perdue in the Georgia runoff elections, which were scheduled for January 5, 2021.
The tweet made fear: driven claims about potential consequences if Democrats were to gain control of the U.S. Senate, without citing any sources.
